Class PenColourPicker

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node

                • paint.PenColourPicker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable
    public class PenColourPicker
extends javafx.scene.control.ColorPicker
    Creates a colour picker that allows the user to select a pen colour

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      PenColourPicker​(PaintCanvas canvas, UndoHistoryListView<java.lang.String> undoStack)
      Given a canvas and list view object it creates a colour picker which when changed updates the canvas and list view accordingly.

      • PenColourPicker

        public PenColourPicker​(PaintCanvas canvas,
                       UndoHistoryListView<java.lang.String> undoStack)
        Given a canvas and list view object it creates a colour picker which when changed updates the canvas and list view accordingly.
        Parameters:
        canvas - the canvas which updates after the change
        undoStack - the list view which updates after the change
